feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 07:00 - 11:00 UTC

Sep 22, 07:34 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the intervention.
We will post a new update to indicate the new maintenance dates

Sep 22, 07:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 22/09/2022 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure, we will upgrade the version of multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Network equipment operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 8, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 20, 15:34 UTC
Update - The maintenance has been postponed.
Here is the new schedule :
Start time : 08/10/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2022 10:00 UTC

Sep 14, 19:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 27/09/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Loss of all services behind the concerned devices for 30 minutes each one.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on some network equipment.

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated servers] - WAW0106B02C
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 3, 02:00 - 03:00 UTC

Sep 20, 22:18 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/10/2022 02:00 UTC
End time : 03/10/2022 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Interruption of network redundancy / Decrease of BP for servers with LACP enabled during the intervention.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be replacing network equipment with defective ports.

entry.title: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Rack 45B27
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 2, 22:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 04:00 UTC

Sep 20, 16:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/10/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 04/10/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the operation.
Related Incident : [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B27
Service improvement : We are moving over the servers from rack 45B27. This resolved the issue with the remote reboot device being unavailable.
